sentences.en: 'How I admire the gallantry of your youthful spirit, Mr. Lorry.'
sentences.cn: “ 我真佩服你老当益壮的侠义精神, 罗瑞先生. ”

sentences.en: A cynical grin lit up the face of his youthful opponent.
sentences.cn: 他那个年轻的对手的脸上露出了讥讽的冷笑.
体育锻练会使你充满活力.

sentences.en: Gary Glitter, 48, revealed the secret of his youthful looks.
sentences.cn: 48岁的加里·格利特透露了他青春永驻的秘密。

sentences.en: He has given up youthful follies.
sentences.cn: 他不再做年轻人的荒唐事了.

sentences.en: He was full of youthful idealism.
sentences.cn: 他满脑子都是年轻人的理想主义。

sentences.en: Her energy and youthful good looks belie her 65 years.
sentences.cn: 她的活力与年轻美貌使人看不出她有65岁了。

sentences.en: Her tale has a consciously youthful tone and storyline, combined with a sly humour.
sentences.cn: 她的故事有意采用富于青春气息的笔调和情节，同时还带些调侃。
我50岁了，但仍富有青春活力。

sentences.en: Marian retains a restless, youthful spirit, in search of new horizons.
sentences.cn: 玛丽安怀着一颗年轻、不断进取的心去寻求新的天地。
她65岁了，但显得非常年轻。

sentences.en: Sun Wukong , his face lit up with youthful vigour, climbed up onto his throne.
sentences.cn: 孙悟空春风满面, 高登宝座.
这孩子看起来岁数很小.

sentences.en: The early ambitions of youthful enthusiasm soon become tempered with realism.
sentences.cn: 之前年少时对理想抱负怀有的一腔热情很快便被现实浇灭。

sentences.en: The photo shows a smiling, youthful Burgos.
sentences.cn: 照片上是一个面带微笑、青春洋溢的布尔戈斯。

sentences.en: The skin loses its youthful bloom.
sentences.cn: 皮肤失去了年轻时的光泽。

words.tran_cn: 年轻的；初期的；没有经验的
年轻地，无经验地；精神饱满地
青年；青春；年轻；青少年时期

trans.tran_en: typical of young people, or seeming young
